sentences.sContent: We can walk to my house from here. It isn’t far.
sentences.sCn: 我们可以从这里步行去我家，不远。

sentences.sContent: You could see the mountains in the far distance.
sentences.sCn: 你可以看到远处的群山。

sentences.sContent: Since I changed jobs, I have to travel further to get to work.
sentences.sCn: 我换了工作，上班更远了。

sentences.sContent: ...which is still in good condition so far without any mechanical breakdowns or potential problems due to my careful maintenance...
...the future of the market looks far from rosy...
...Life Reimagined paints a picture of middle age that is far from gloomy...
...is often conducted in a way that makes children incurious children of educated and upper-middle-class parents turn out to be far more curious...
...and there were small towns and New York wasn't that far away...
...Perhaps a return to real cooking needn't be far off...
...So far there has been no scientific proof of the educational benefits of iPads...
...a hold extending far beyond their literary content...
...by far the largest bookseller in the country...
...but far more significant events were at work...

synos.tran: 很；遥远地；久远地；到很远的距离；到很深的程度
